component.name: Driver Pilot
component.summary: Smart GPU Driver Manager for Linux

description.p: Driver Pilot is a modern utility designed to simplify the management of NVIDIA and AMD graphics drivers on Linux systems. It provides a user-friendly interface for installation, updates, and system monitoring.

ul.li: Express Installation: Automatically detects hardware and installs the optimal drivers.
Performance Dashboard: Live monitoring of GPU/CPU temperatures, load, and RAM usage.
Hybrid Graphics Control: Manage NVIDIA Prime profiles (Mux Switch) easily.
System Safety: Integrated Timeshift backup support and Secure Boot detection.
Repository Optimization: Auto-configure the fastest package mirrors for your location.
